jcr:content.jcr:description: The Altra Provision 5 is a running shoe designed to help you find your best stride yet. Find out more about how this road running shoe will help you perform!
jcr:content.jcr:title: Provision 5

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
THE PROVISION 5:
THE SUPPORT YOU NEED
TO PAVE YOUR OWN WAY

customhtml2.customHTML:
The all-new Provision 5 is here to help you find your best stride yet. With FootShape™ comfort and dynamic arch support, this road runner is breaking barriers and helping you push past limitations.

ARCH SUPPORT

If you're seeking a little more arch support for your runs, look no further than the brand new Provision 5 with InnovArch™ technology. It encourages natural foot placement in each step to better connect mind, body, and feet.

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
SUPPORT THAT MOVES WITH YOU

Part of what makes the Provision line a favorite amongst distance runners is the supportive nature of the shoe. With GuideRail™ technology, you get extra medial support – but only when you need it.

image.alt: Instep shot of Altra Running Provision 5
Woman running in a path with an outline of a foot shape overlaying the image

customhtml2.customHTML:
ALTRA FOOTSHAPE™ COMFORT

Our signature FootShape™ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet.
